synopsis.text:
Gundam enthusiasts rejoice as a new Internet service, the Gundam Metaverse Project, emerges, celebrating the 10th anniversary of the 'Gundam Build' franchise. In this virtual realm, users can immerse themselves in a world of Gunpla, controlling avatars, interacting with others, participating in thrilling Gunpla Battles, and even purchasing actual Gunpla.

Our protagonist, Rio Hojo, a young boy residing in Hawaii, takes the plunge into this exciting digital universe. Under the guidance of a local hobbyist, Seria Urutuski, Rio refines his Gunpla building techniques in the physical world. Meanwhile, in the Metaverse, he learns the ropes of Gunpla Battle from the enigmatic Mask Lady.

Day by day, Rio's skills sharpen, culminating in the creation of his original Gunpla masterpiece, the Lah Gundam. His journey takes an unexpected turn when he crosses paths with former Gunpla Battle champions in the Metaverse. With his sights set on becoming a formidable contender, Rio embarks on a quest to seek out and challenge stronger opponents.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
